message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $180. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $120?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to pay $120, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I'm getting closer to what I can afford, Alice. How about $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $145, but I think you'll love it even more at $145. Let me see if we can meet in the middle at $145.
